attributes.action: put black covers on pornography or restrict their availability.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although would be great to ban all pornography(and see the many societal BENEFITS that would come from such action), we would like to at least see this industry be a bit more discreet in its advertising.  

We would like to make it compulsory for pornographic magazine printers to place black covers on their products, thereby respecting those of us who find such dissolute use of women (and men) personally offensive.

Alternatively (or perhaps preferably) restrict the sale of these materials to the "adult stores".
